Software: DSE

DSE Decomposition

DSE is a toolbox for variance decomposition of 4D data sets in order to diagnose spatio-temporal corruptions. Please direct any questions about this work to Soroosh Afyouni & Tom Nichols.

  • Manuscript:
    Soroosh Afyouni, Thomas E. Nichols. Insight and Inference for DVARS. bioRxiv 125021
    PDF
  • Github:
    Source code and full release details can be found here.

Example

Below is application of the DSE decomposition on 800 subjects of two example data-sets; ABIDE and HCP100.

Oxford Big Data Institute at the University of Oxford
